name: Whirlpool Monster Truck Derby - Car Demolition
name_original: Whirlpool Monster Truck Derby - Car Demolition
description: Choose your favorite monster truck and crash all the opponents present on the death racing tracks. Let them know who you are. Show your ultimate monster truck driving skills and prove them to be the best monster truck driver in this world. Step up and drive your monster truck 3D through dangerous turns and twists in one of the best crashing car games. Leap over fiery environment of this cool fantasy city. If you are a champ of demolition derby games then all you need to do is get yourself a dose of amazing stunts and somersaults. So, hop on your favorite monster truck and show your excellent stunting skills with WHIRLPOOL MONSTER TRUCK DERBY best of in derby car games.
